subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: The Mets are 3-6 against the Braves this season, but have won four of their past five games and may be in their best position all season to increase their N.L. East advantage.
snippet: The Mets are 3-6 against the Braves this season, but have won four of their past five games and may be in their best position all season to increase their N.L. East advantage.
